}

function getResult() {
    return json.data.map(function (item) {
        let id = Number.parseInt(decrypt(item.Id + ''));
        return {
            cover: decrypt(item.Img),
            url: 'https://infosxs.pysmei.com/BookFiles/Html/' + (Math.floor(id / 1000) + 1) + '/' + item.Id + '/info.html',
            title: decrypt(item.Name),
            author: decrypt(item.Author),
            category: decrypt(item.CName),
            update: decrypt(item.LastChapter),
            updateTime: decrypt(item.UpdateTime),
            desc: decrypt(item.Desc)
        }
    })
}
getResult();

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

	a="㟦㟧㠫㠬㠭㡭㣇㣈㣉㣊㤗㤙㤚㥕㥖㥧㥨㥫㥯㦁㦂㦃㦄㦅㦆㦇㦦㦧㦨㦩㦪㦫㦬㦱㦲㦳㦴㦵㦶㦷㦹㦺㧖㧗㧘㧙㧚㧛㧜㧝㧞㧠㨦㨧㨩㨪㨫㨬㨼㨽㨾㨿㩀㩁㩘㩙㩚㩛㩶㩷㩸㩹㩺㩻㩼㩽㩾㪏㪐㪑㪒㪧㪨㪩㪪㪫㪲㪳㪴㪵㪶㪷㪸㪹㪺㪻㪼㪽㪾㪿㫀㫅㫆㫇㫈㫉㫊㫋㫌㫠㫡㫢㫣㫤㫥㫦㫧㫨㫩㫪㫫㫬㫭㫮㫯㫷㫸㫹㫺㫻㫼㮺㮻㮼㮽㮾㰘㰙㰚㰛㰜㰝㰰㰱㰲㰳㰴㰵㰶㰷㰸㰹㰺㱏㱐㱑㱒㱓㱔㱕㱖㱗㱚㱛㱜㱝㱞㱟㱦㱧㱨㱩㱪㱫㲤㲥㳍㳎㳏㳐㳑㳒㳓㳔㳡㳢㳣㳤㳥㵐㵑㵒㵓㵔㵕㵖㵗㵙㵛㵜㶂㶃㶄㶅㹏㹐㹑㹒㹓㹔㹕㹖㹗㺧䀱䀲䀳䀴䁨䁩䁪䁫䁬䁭䁯䁰䁱䁲䃃䃄䃢䃣䃤䋁䋂䋃䋄䋅䋆䋇䋝䋞䋟䋠䋡䋢䋣䋤䋥䋦䋧䋨䋩䋪䌞䌟䌠䌡䑓䑔䑕䑖䑗䗕䗖䗗䗘䗙䗻䗼䗽䗾䗿䘂䘓䘔䘘䛈䛉䛊䛋䛌䛍䛎䛏䛐䛑䛒䛓䛔䛕䛖䛗䜥䜧䜨䜪䜬䜭䜮䥉䥊䥋䥌䥍䦡䦢䦣䦤䦥䨈䨉䨊䪟䪠䭴䭵䭶䭷䭸䭹䭺䭻䭼䭽䭾䭿䮀䮁䮊䮋䮌䮍䮎䮏䮷䮸䮹䮺䮻䯩䯪䯫䯬䯭䯮䯯䯰䰂䰃䰄䰅䲅䲆䲇䲈䲉䲖䲗䲘䲙䲺䲻䲼䲽䲾䲿䳀䶏䶐䶑䶒䶓丳丵丷乀乁乄乆乊乕僾噷噸噹嚠嚡嚢團圙圚圛圝堨塨塺塿墵墷墺壄壜夌复奫婈婖婤婺媐媩媱嫀嫳嬨嬮嵗嵙嵚嵜嵞嵟巪巬巭櫿欇欛欜欝鼲鼳鼴鼵鼶鼷鼸齀齂훒";

b="一二十丁厂七八人入儿九几了刀力又三干亏土工才寸丈大与万上小口山巾千亡义之尸已弓己也飞乞川亿个么久勺丸凡及习叉马乡丰开夫天元无云扎艺五支厅犬区尤匹车巨牙屯互切止少日中贝冈见手午气升长仁片化仇币仍仅斤爪反介父从今凶乏仓氏风欠丹匀乌勾凤六文方火忆订户认心尺巴队办以允予幻玉末未击打巧正扑功扔甘世古节本术可丙左厉石右布龙平轧东的是在不有和这为国我电由只要他时来叫用们叹四失生到代作地于出就分乎对令成会乐句册外处冬鸟包主市闪发年动头汉宁它百同能而下过子说产种面后多定学法行至此所民得光经进虫着等部度家里如回水高自理起物现实加量都两体制机当使点业去把性好应合还因其些然前政那社事形相全表间样色关各重新线内数你明看原利比或但质第向道命变条污没结解问意建月公军系很情者最立想通并提直题党阶阴程奸展妇妈戏果料象员革位常总痉茎筑弄战婴轮泽胡锦涛毛林湿白医痹疱批扯疣走抄坝贡裸赤枪抓女美罪交密宫啊爱痒她娼娈嫖媾屌残智共亲活克神丽李独暴游集男死套骚操足插圆假幼弟盗货芽花爹跌劳魔鬼殖器领屁逼菊婊棒极消妹母卫";
for(i in a){	
result=result.replace(new RegExp(a[i],"g"),b[i]);
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?' +String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2) +'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
